articles.title: Here's how Trump's tariffs could impact you and your wallet - NPR
articles.description: Tariffs are now in effect on goods from China, and imports from Canada and Mexico could be next (again). Americans are likely to see higher prices on a wide variety of products as a result.
articles.content:
Every day, many people in the U.S. eat fruit grown in Mexico, use phones made in China and live in homes built from lumber from Canada.
Now, trade with those three countries could be interrupted. Pr… [+7967 chars]
